00039 static void remdoubles_splitface(BMFace *f, BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00040 {
00041     BMIter liter;
00042     BMLoop *l;
00043     BMVert *v2, *doub;
00044     int split = FALSE;
00045 
00046     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00047         v2 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", l->v);
00048         /* ok: if v2 is NULL (e.g. not in the map) then it's
00049          *     a target vert, otherwise it's a double */
00050         if ((v2 && BM_vert_in_face(f, v2)) &&
00051             (v2 != l->prev->v) &&
00052             (v2 != l->next->v))
00053         {
00054             doub = l->v;
00055             split = TRUE;
00056             break;
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060     if (split && doub != v2) {
00061         BMLoop *nl;
00062         BMFace *f2 = BM_face_split(bm, f, doub, v2, &nl, NULL, FALSE);
00063 
00064         remdoubles_splitface(f, bm, op);
00065         remdoubles_splitface(f2, bm, op);
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 #define ELE_DEL     1
00070 #define EDGE_COL    2
00071 #define FACE_MARK   2
00072 
00073 #if 0
00074 int remdoubles_face_overlaps(BMesh *bm, BMVert **varr,
00075                              int len, BMFace *exclude,
00076                              BMFace **overlapface)
00077 {
00078     BMIter vertfaces;
00079     BMFace *f;
00080     int i, amount;
00081 
00082     if (overlapface) *overlapface = NULL;
00083 
00084     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00085         f = BM_iter_new(&vertfaces, bm, BM_FACES_OF_VERT, varr[i]);
00086         while (f) {
00087             amount = BM_verts_in_face(bm, f, varr, len);
00088             if (amount >= len) {
00089                 if (overlapface) *overlapface = f;
00090                 return TRUE;
00091             }
00092             f = BM_iter_step(&vertfaces);
00093         }
00094     }
00095     return FALSE;
00096 }
00097 #endif

00099 void bmo_weldverts_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00100 {
00101     BMIter iter, liter;
00102     BMVert *v, *v2;
00103     BMEdge *e, *e2, **edges = NULL;
00104     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00105     BMLoop *l, *l2, **loops = NULL;
00106     BLI_array_declare(loops);
00107     BMFace *f, *f2;
00108     int a, b;
00109 
00110     /* mark merge verts for deletion */
00111     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00112         if ((v2 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", v))) {
00113             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, ELE_DEL);
00114 
00115             /* merge the vertex flags, else we get randomly selected/unselected verts */
00116             BM_elem_flag_merge(v, v2);
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120     /* check if any faces are getting their own corners merged
00121      * together, split face if so */
00122     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00123         remdoubles_splitface(f, bm, op);
00124     }
00125 
00126     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00127         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->v1, ELE_DEL) || BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->v2, ELE_DEL)) {
00128             v = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", e->v1);
00129             v2 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", e->v2);
00130             
00131             if (!v) v = e->v1;
00132             if (!v2) v2 = e->v2;
00133 
00134             if (v == v2) {
00135                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_COL);
00136             }
00137             else if (!BM_edge_exists(v, v2)) {
00138                 BM_edge_create(bm, v, v2, e, TRUE);
00139             }
00140 
00141             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_DEL);
00142         }
00143     }
00144 
00145     /* BMESH_TODO, stop abusing face index here */
00146     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00147         BM_elem_index_set(f, 0); /* set_dirty! */
00148         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00149             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->v, ELE_DEL)) {
00150                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_MARK|ELE_DEL);
00151             }
00152             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, EDGE_COL)) {
00153                 BM_elem_index_set(f, BM_elem_index_get(f) + 1); /* set_dirty! */
00154             }
00155         }
00156     }
00157     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_FACE;
00158 
00159     /* faces get "modified" by creating new faces here, then at the
00160      * end the old faces are deleted */
00161     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00162         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_MARK))
00163             continue;
00164 
00165         if (f->len - BM_elem_index_get(f) < 3) {
00166             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, ELE_DEL);
00167             continue;
00168         }
00169 
00170         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00171         BLI_array_empty(loops);
00172         a = 0;
00173         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00174             v = l->v;
00175             v2 = l->next->v;
00176             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, ELE_DEL)) {
00177                 v = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", v);
00178             }
00179             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v2, ELE_DEL)) {
00180                 v2 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", v2);
00181             }
00182             
00183             e2 = v != v2 ? BM_edge_exists(v, v2) : NULL;
00184             if (e2) {
00185                 for (b = 0; b < a; b++) {
00186                     if (edges[b] == e2) {
00187                         break;
00188                     }
00189                 }
00190                 if (b != a) {
00191                     continue;
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 BLI_array_growone(edges);
00195                 BLI_array_growone(loops);
00196 
00197                 edges[a] = e2;
00198                 loops[a] = l;
00199 
00200                 a++;
00201             }
00202         }
00203         
00204         if (BLI_array_count(loops) < 3)
00205             continue;
00206         v = loops[0]->v;
00207         v2 = loops[1]->v;
00208 
00209         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, ELE_DEL)) {
00210             v = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", v);
00211         }
00212         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v2, ELE_DEL)) {
00213             v2 = BMO_slot_map_ptr_get(bm, op, "targetmap", v2);
00214         }
00215         
00216         f2 = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, v, v2, edges, a, TRUE);
00217         if (f2 && (f2 != f)) {
00218             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, f, f2);
00219 
00220             a = 0;
00221             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f2, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00222                 l2 = loops[a];
00223                 BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l2, l);
00224 
00225                 a++;
00226             }
00227         }
00228     }
00229 
00230     BMO_op_callf(bm, "del geom=%fvef context=%i", ELE_DEL, DEL_ONLYTAGGED);
00231 
00232     BLI_array_free(edges);
00233     BLI_array_free(loops);
00234 }
00235 
00236 static int vergaverco(const void *e1, const void *e2)
00237 {
00238     const BMVert *v1 = *(void **)e1, *v2 = *(void **)e2;
00239     float x1 = v1->co[0] + v1->co[1] + v1->co[2];
00240     float x2 = v2->co[0] + v2->co[1] + v2->co[2];
00241 
00242     if      (x1 > x2) return  1;
00243     else if (x1 < x2) return -1;
00244     else return 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247 #define VERT_TESTED 1
00248 #define VERT_DOUBLE 2
00249 #define VERT_TARGET 4
00250 #define VERT_KEEP   8
00251 #define VERT_MARK   16
00252 #define VERT_IN     32
00253 
00254 #define EDGE_MARK   1
00255 
00256 void bmo_pointmerge_facedata_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00257 {
00258     BMOIter siter;
00259     BMIter iter;
00260     BMVert *v, *snapv;
00261     BMLoop *l, *firstl = NULL;
00262     float fac;
00263     int i, tot;
00264 
00265     snapv = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, op, "snapv", BM_VERT);
00266     tot = BM_vert_face_count(snapv);
00267 
00268     if (!tot)
00269         return;
00270 
00271     fac = 1.0f / tot;
00272     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, snapv, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00273         if (!firstl) {
00274             firstl = l;
00275         }
00276         
00277         for (i = 0; i < bm->ldata.totlayer; i++) {
00278             if (CustomData_layer_has_math(&bm->ldata, i)) {
00279                 int type = bm->ldata.layers[i].type;
00280                 void *e1, *e2;
00281 
00282                 e1 = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(&bm->ldata, firstl->head.data, i);
00283                 e2 = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, i);
00284                 
00285                 CustomData_data_multiply(type, e2, fac);
00286 
00287                 if (l != firstl)
00288                     CustomData_data_add(type, e1, e2);
00289             }
00290         }
00291     }
00292 
00293     BMO_ITER (v, &siter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT) {
00294         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00295             if (l == firstl) {
00296                 continue;
00297             }
00298 
00299             CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&bm->ldata, &bm->ldata, firstl->head.data, &l->head.data);
00300         }
00301     }
00302 }
00303 
00304 void bmo_vert_average_facedata_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00305 {
00306     BMOIter siter;
00307     BMIter iter;
00308     BMVert *v;
00309     BMLoop *l /* , *firstl = NULL */;
00310     CDBlockBytes min, max;
00311     void *block;
00312     int i, type;
00313 
00314     for (i = 0; i < bm->ldata.totlayer; i++) {
00315         if (!CustomData_layer_has_math(&bm->ldata, i))
00316             continue;
00317         
00318         type = bm->ldata.layers[i].type;
00319         CustomData_data_initminmax(type, &min, &max);
00320 
00321         BMO_ITER (v, &siter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT) {
00322             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00323                 block = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, i);
00324                 CustomData_data_dominmax(type, block, &min, &max);
00325             }
00326         }
00327 
00328         CustomData_data_multiply(type, &min, 0.5f);
00329         CustomData_data_multiply(type, &max, 0.5f);
00330         CustomData_data_add(type, &min, &max);
00331 
00332         BMO_ITER (v, &siter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT) {
00333             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00334                 block = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, i);
00335                 CustomData_data_copy_value(type, &min, block);
00336             }
00337         }
00338     }
00339 }

00341 void bmo_pointmerge_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00342 {
00343     BMOperator weldop;
00344     BMOIter siter;
00345     BMVert *v, *snapv = NULL;
00346     float vec[3];
00347     
00348     BMO_slot_vec_get(op, "mergeco", vec);
00349 
00350     //BMO_op_callf(bm, "collapse_uvs edges=%s", op, "edges");
00351     BMO_op_init(bm, &weldop, "weldverts");
00352     
00353     BMO_ITER (v, &siter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT) {
00354         if (!snapv) {
00355             snapv = v;
00356             copy_v3_v3(snapv->co, vec);
00357         }
00358         else {
00359             BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, &weldop, "targetmap", v, snapv);
00360         }
00361     }
00362 
00363     BMO_op_exec(bm, &weldop);
00364     BMO_op_finish(bm, &weldop);
00365 }
00366 
00367 void bmo_collapse_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00368 {
00369     BMOperator weldop;
00370     BMWalker walker;
00371     BMIter iter;
00372     BMEdge *e, **edges = NULL;
00373     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00374     float min[3], max[3];
00375     int i, tot;
00376     
00377     BMO_op_callf(bm, "collapse_uvs edges=%s", op, "edges");
00378     BMO_op_init(bm, &weldop, "weldverts");
00379 
00380     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
00381 
00382     BMW_init(&walker, bm, BMW_SHELL,
00383              BMW_MASK_NOP, EDGE_MARK, BMW_MASK_NOP,
00384              BMW_FLAG_NOP, /* no need to use BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN, already marked data */
00385              BMW_NIL_LAY);
00386 
00387     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00388         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK))
00389             continue;
00390 
00391         e = BMW_begin(&walker, e->v1);
00392         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00393 
00394         INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00395         for (tot = 0; e; tot++, e = BMW_step(&walker)) {
00396             BLI_array_growone(edges);
00397             edges[tot] = e;
00398 
00399             DO_MINMAX(e->v1->co, min, max);
00400             DO_MINMAX(e->v2->co, min, max);
00401         }
00402 
00403         add_v3_v3v3(min, min, max);
00404         mul_v3_fl(min, 0.5f);
00405 
00406         /* snap edges to a point.  for initial testing purposes anyway */
00407         for (i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00408             copy_v3_v3(edges[i]->v1->co, min);
00409             copy_v3_v3(edges[i]->v2->co, min);
00410             
00411             if (edges[i]->v1 != edges[0]->v1)
00412                 BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, &weldop, "targetmap", edges[i]->v1, edges[0]->v1);
00413             if (edges[i]->v2 != edges[0]->v1)
00414                 BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, &weldop, "targetmap", edges[i]->v2, edges[0]->v1);
00415         }
00416     }
00417     
00418     BMO_op_exec(bm, &weldop);
00419     BMO_op_finish(bm, &weldop);
00420 
00421     BMW_end(&walker);
00422     BLI_array_free(edges);
00423 }
00424 
00425 /* uv collapse function */
00426 static void bmo_collapsecon_do_layer(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, int layer)
00427 {
00428     BMIter iter, liter;
00429     BMFace *f;
00430     BMLoop *l, *l2;
00431     BMWalker walker;
00432     void **blocks = NULL;
00433     BLI_array_declare(blocks);
00434     CDBlockBytes min, max;
00435     int i, tot, type = bm->ldata.layers[layer].type;
00436 
00437     /* clear all short flags */
00438     BMO_mesh_flag_disable_all(bm, op, BM_ALL, (1 << 16) - 1);
00439 
00440     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
00441 
00442     BMW_init(&walker, bm, BMW_LOOPDATA_ISLAND,
00443              BMW_MASK_NOP, EDGE_MARK, BMW_MASK_NOP,
00444              BMW_FLAG_NOP, /* no need to use BMW_FLAG_TEST_HIDDEN, already marked data */
00445              layer);
00446 
00447     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00448         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00449             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00450                 /* walk */
00451                 BLI_array_empty(blocks);
00452                 tot = 0;
00453                 l2 = BMW_begin(&walker, l);
00454 
00455                 CustomData_data_initminmax(type, &min, &max);
00456                 for (tot = 0; l2; tot++, l2 = BMW_step(&walker)) {
00457                     BLI_array_growone(blocks);
00458                     blocks[tot] = CustomData_bmesh_get_layer_n(&bm->ldata, l2->head.data, layer);
00459                     CustomData_data_dominmax(type, blocks[tot], &min, &max);
00460                 }
00461 
00462                 if (tot) {
00463                     CustomData_data_multiply(type, &min, 0.5f);
00464                     CustomData_data_multiply(type, &max, 0.5f);
00465                     CustomData_data_add(type, &min, &max);
00466 
00467                     /* snap CD (uv, vcol) points to their centroid */
00468                     for (i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00469                         CustomData_data_copy_value(type, &min, blocks[i]);
00470                     }
00471                 }
00472             }
00473         }
00474     }
00475 
00476     BMW_end(&walker);
00477     BLI_array_free(blocks);
00478 }
00479 
00480 void bmo_collapse_uvs_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00481 {
00482     int i;
00483 
00484     for (i = 0; i < bm->ldata.totlayer; i++) {
00485         if (CustomData_layer_has_math(&bm->ldata, i))
00486             bmo_collapsecon_do_layer(bm, op, i);
00487     }
00488 }
00489 
00490 void bmesh_finddoubles_common(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, BMOperator *optarget, const char *targetmapname)
00491 {
00492     BMOIter oiter;
00493     BMVert *v, *v2;
00494     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00495     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00496     float dist, dist3;
00497     int i, j, len, keepvert = 0;
00498 
00499     dist = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "dist");
00500     dist3 = dist * 3.0f;
00501 
00502     i = 0;
00503     BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT) {
00504         BLI_array_growone(verts);
00505         verts[i++] = v;
00506     }
00507 
00508     /* Test whether keepverts arg exists and is non-empty */
00509     if (BMO_slot_exists(op, "keepverts")) {
00510         keepvert = BMO_iter_new(&oiter, bm, op, "keepverts", BM_VERT) != NULL;
00511     }
00512 
00513     /* sort by vertex coordinates added together */
00514     qsort(verts, BLI_array_count(verts), sizeof(void *), vergaverco);
00515 
00516     /* Flag keepverts */
00517     if (keepvert) {
00518         BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "keepverts", BM_VERT, VERT_KEEP);
00519     }
00520 
00521     len = BLI_array_count(verts);
00522     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00523         v = verts[i];
00524         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_DOUBLE)) {
00525             continue;
00526         }
00527 
00528         for (j = i + 1; j < len; j++) {
00529             v2 = verts[j];
00530 
00531             /* Compare sort values of the verts using 3x tolerance (allowing for the tolerance
00532              * on each of the three axes). This avoids the more expensive length comparison
00533              * for most vertex pairs. */
00534             if ((v2->co[0] + v2->co[1] + v2->co[2]) - (v->co[0] + v->co[1] + v->co[2]) > dist3)
00535                 break;
00536 
00537             if (keepvert) {
00538                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v2, VERT_KEEP) == BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_KEEP))
00539                     continue;
00540             }
00541 
00542             if (compare_len_v3v3(v->co, v2->co, dist)) {
00543 
00544                 /* If one vert is marked as keep, make sure it will be the target */
00545                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v2, VERT_KEEP)) {
00546                     SWAP(BMVert *, v, v2);
00547                 }
00548 
00549                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v2, VERT_DOUBLE);
00550                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, VERT_TARGET);
00551 
00552                 BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, optarget, targetmapname, v2, v);
00553             }
00554         }
00555     }
00556 
00557     BLI_array_free(verts);
00558 }
00559 
00560 void bmo_removedoubles_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00561 {
00562     BMOperator weldop;
00563 
00564     BMO_op_init(bm, &weldop, "weldverts");
00565     bmesh_finddoubles_common(bm, op, &weldop, "targetmap");
00566     BMO_op_exec(bm, &weldop);
00567     BMO_op_finish(bm, &weldop);
00568 }

00570 
00571 void bmo_finddoubles_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00572 {
00573     bmesh_finddoubles_common(bm, op, op, "targetmapout");
00574 }
00575 
00576 void bmo_automerge_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00577 {
00578     BMOperator findop, weldop;
00579     BMIter viter;
00580     BMVert *v;
00581 
00582     /* The "verts" input sent to this op is the set of verts that
00583      * can be merged away into any other verts. Mark all other verts
00584      * as VERT_KEEP. */
00585     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "verts", BM_VERT, VERT_IN);
00586     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00587         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, VERT_IN)) {
00588             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, VERT_KEEP);
00589         }
00590     }
00591 
00592     /* Search for doubles among all vertices, but only merge non-VERT_KEEP
00593      * vertices into VERT_KEEP vertices. */
00594     BMO_op_initf(bm, &findop, "finddoubles verts=%av keepverts=%fv", VERT_KEEP);
00595     BMO_slot_copy(op, &findop, "dist", "dist");
00596     BMO_op_exec(bm, &findop);
00597 
00598     /* weld the vertices */
00599     BMO_op_init(bm, &weldop, "weldverts");
00600     BMO_slot_copy(&findop, &weldop, "targetmapout", "targetmap");
00601     BMO_op_exec(bm, &weldop);
00602 
00603     BMO_op_finish(bm, &findop);
00604     BMO_op_finish(bm, &weldop);
00605 }
